Address.label: Address
Address.value: 249 EAST GARDENA BOULEVARD, GARDENA, California, 90248, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Polar Power Inc is engaged in designing, manufacturing, and selling direct current power systems for applications in the telecommunications market, military, electric vehicle charging, cogeneration, distributed power, and uninterrupted power supply. The company's products include DC generators, Back-up DC generators, hybrid power systems, Li-Ion battery systems, and Marine DC generators.
